# The Terminators Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this group only apply to instructions for which LLVMIsATerminatorInst returns true. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group only apply to instructions for which LLVMIsATerminatorInst returns true.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMGetCondition() {#ga5b05b4576269f98850c02337497271df}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetCondition (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Branch)</>}>
Return the condition of a branch instruction.

This only works on <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">llvm::BranchInst</a> instructions.
